com.bigdata.rdf.sail

Class TestBootstrapBigdataSail

  • java.lang.Object
    • junit.framework.Assert
      • junit.framework.TestCase
        • junit.framework.TestCase2
          • com.bigdata.rdf.sail.TestBootstrapBigdataSail
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    junit.framework.Test

    public class TestBootstrapBigdataSail
extends TestCase2
    Bootstrap test case for bringing up the BigdataSail.
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Bryan Thompson

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void test_ctor_1()
      Test create and shutdown of the default store.
      void test_ctor_2()
      Test create and shutdown of a named store.
      void test_getConnection()
      Test creates a database, obtains a writable connection on the database, and then closes the connection and shutdown the database.
      void test_getConnectionAllowedExactlyOnce1_oneThread()
      Unit test verifies that a thread may not obtain more than one instance of the unisolated connection at a time from the BigdataSail via a reentrant invocation.
      void test_getConnectionAllowedExactlyOnce1_twoThreads()
      Unit test verifies that a thread may not obtain more than one instance of the unisolated connection at a time from the BigdataSail using two threads.
      void test_getConnectionAllowedExactlyOnce2()
      Unit test verifies exactly one unisolated connection for two different BigdataSail instances for the same AbstractTripleStore on the same Journal.
      void test_getConnectionAllowedExactlyOnce3()
      Unit test verifying that exactly one unisolated connection is allowed at a time for two sails wrapping different AbstractTripleStore instances.
      void test_isolationOfUnisolatedConnection()
      Test creates a database, obtains a writable connection, writes some data on the store, verifies that the data can be read back from within the connection but that it is not visible in a read-committed view, commits the write set, and verifies that the data is now visible in a read-committed view.

        public void test_getConnection()

      • test_getConnectionAllowedExactlyOnce1_oneThread

        public void test_getConnectionAllowedExactlyOnce1_oneThread()
                                                     throws org.openrdf.sail.SailException,
                                                            InterruptedException,
                                                            ExecutionException
        Unit test verifies that a thread may not obtain more than one instance of the unisolated connection at a time from the BigdataSail via a reentrant invocation. The reentrant request should immediately throw an exception to prevent an unbreakable deadlock (a thread can not wait on itself).
        Throws:
        org.openrdf.sail.SailException
        InterruptedException
        ExecutionException

      • test_getConnectionAllowedExactlyOnce1_twoThreads

        public void test_getConnectionAllowedExactlyOnce1_twoThreads()
                                                      throws org.openrdf.sail.SailException,
                                                             InterruptedException,
                                                             ExecutionException,
                                                             TimeoutException
        Unit test verifies that a thread may not obtain more than one instance of the unisolated connection at a time from the BigdataSail using two threads. The second thread should block until the first thread releases the connection, at which point the second thread should obtain the connection.
        Throws:
        org.openrdf.sail.SailException
        InterruptedException
        ExecutionException
        TimeoutException

      • test_getConnectionAllowedExactlyOnce2

        public void test_getConnectionAllowedExactlyOnce2()
                                           throws org.openrdf.sail.SailException,
                                                  InterruptedException,
                                                  ExecutionException
        Unit test verifies exactly one unisolated connection for two different BigdataSail instances for the same AbstractTripleStore on the same Journal.
        Throws:
        org.openrdf.sail.SailException
        InterruptedException
        ExecutionException

      • test_getConnectionAllowedExactlyOnce3

        public void test_getConnectionAllowedExactlyOnce3()
                                           throws org.openrdf.sail.SailException,
                                                  InterruptedException,
                                                  ExecutionException
        Unit test verifying that exactly one unisolated connection is allowed at a time for two sails wrapping different AbstractTripleStore instances. (This guarantee is needed to preserve ACID semantics for the unisolated connection when there is more than one AbstractTripleStore on the same Journal. However, scale-out should not enforce this constraint since it is shard-wise ACID for unisolated operations.)
        Throws:
        org.openrdf.sail.SailException
        InterruptedException
        ExecutionException

      • test_isolationOfUnisolatedConnection

        public void test_isolationOfUnisolatedConnection()
                                          throws org.openrdf.sail.SailException,
                                                 InterruptedException
        Test creates a database, obtains a writable connection, writes some data on the store, verifies that the data can be read back from within the connection but that it is not visible in a read-committed view, commits the write set, and verifies that the data is now visible in a read-committed view. TODO variant that writes, aborts the write, and verifies that the data was not made restart safe.
        Throws:
        org.openrdf.sail.SailException
        InterruptedException
